short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Popup access to Google Contacts with highlight search!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pop up your Google Contacts in a new window for easy reference and update. 

On startup and every time the extension icon is pressed, it searches your Google Contacts using either one of the following: 

        1. Any highlighted text in the current tab or 
        2. The site name of the current URL. 

So, any time you are in a web page and want to check the contact information based on the site name or any highlighted text in the page, simply press the CoolDerive Contacts Extension.
